Class MarketDisplay

java.lang.Object
  gui.MarketDisplay

public class MarketDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

A text based interface to the trading system

Author:
Urvi

MarketDisplay

public MarketDisplay(User u,
                     UserDisplayManager outer)
Public constructor, creates a MarketDisplay object

outer - UserDisplayManager object
Method Detail

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean value)
Sets the User's display to visible so that User's msgs can be seen

Parameters:
value - Boolean that is true if User's display is visible, false otherwise

updateMarketData

public void updateMarketData(java.lang.String product,
                             Price bp,
                             int bv,
                             Price sp,
                             int sv)
Parameters:
product - The product that was traded
bp - The buy price of the product that was traded
bv - The buy volume of the product that was traded
sp - The sell price of the product that was traded
sv - The sell volume of the product that was traded

updateLastSale

public void updateLastSale(java.lang.String product,
                           Price p,
                           int v)
Udpates a subscribled User's display with last sale information that is passed in

Parameters:
product - The stock symbol for which last sale information was subscribed
p - The Price of the last sale
v - The volume of the last sale

updateTicker

public void updateTicker(java.lang.String product,
                         Price p,
                         char direction)
Updates a subscribed User's display with ticker information that is passed in

Parameters:
product - The stock symbol for which ticker information was subscribed
p - The price of the stock
direction - The direction of the market for that stock. The direction is up if the price went up since the last ticker publisher, down otherwise

updateMarketActivity

public void updateMarketActivity(java.lang.String activity)
Updates a User's display with String that is passed in, reflecting activity (i.e., orders submitted, cancelled, or traded)

Parameters:
activity - String containing information about recent activity

updateMarketState

public void updateMarketState(java.lang.String state)
Updates a User's display with the current market state

Parameters:
state - The current market state: PREOPEN, OPEN, CLOSED
